mapper.update:
update object_user_relation
object_type = #{objectType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
employer_id = #{employerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
visible_type = #{visibleType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
accept_status=#{acceptStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update object_user_relation set object_type = #{objectType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, employer_id = #{employerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT our.* from object_user_relation our WHERE our.stateflag=0 and our.object_id=#{lenderId} and our.object_type=#{objectType} and our.type=1 and our.employer_id IN (SELECT tut.id from t_teammate_re ttr,t_user_team tut where tut.id=ttr.user_team_id AND ttr.user_id=#{userId} AND tut.object_id=#{lenderId} AND tut.object_type=#{objectType})
